page.title: 07EVENTS 2 BRAE
page.content: THE NEW BRAE HALL The new community hall was opened in June 1984.It was built by Bigland and Mowat a local firm at a cost of Â£167,000.Money for the project was raised by the local community and with the help of various grants from different organisations. The new hall was built on the site of the old secondary school.Some of the old classrooms were used for the cloakrooms,toilets,kitchen and bar.The main dance floor and stage are in a new building. The first foundation stone was laid by Mr. James Johnson of Busta and the hall was opened by Mrs Amy Hendry. The hall is used for many different things Discos,Dances,Weddings,Sales and Christmas parties.It is used by every member of the community.
